actions.display:
As you walk through the eerie archway of the entrance, you become aware of a strange silence, broken only by the grotesque cries of unknown creatures faintly echoing down the passageways.
Abruptly, the passage opens up into a large round room with a domed ceiling.  Doors lead off to the North, East and West.  In the centre of the room stands an enormous statue - that of a man with a wolf’s head.  The statue has a door in one side.
